rightText: I have been in the startup space for the last four years. During that time, I have been involved in a wide variety of functional areas including marketing, UI/UX design, web analytics and growth hacking. I am also a full stack web developer with a focus in RoR and AngularJS. I am currently working as a freelance consultant helping companies adjust feature sets and improve the UI/UX experience of their products. I am also working on two music projects that are in the final stages of development. Prior to working in the startup space, I worked as a mergers & acqusitions consultant for a boutique firm that focuses on the government services industry.

funFacts.fact: I was born and raised in Newton, Massachusetts
I am the youngest of three siblings.
I have an unhealthy obsession with bright colored sunglasses.
I have never lost a game of Settlers of Catan
I am avid Boston sports fan.
